topics.body:
In actually important news congress is trying to bring back nsa spying, *BUT* the kick is that they're having such a hard time with the bill that it's effectively lobotomizing the bill.

If warrant-less spying on citizens does come back then chances are it's going to be ungodly gutted and ripped apart.

Will they be caught, 9 out if ten says yes but it would be a better effort instead of shoving it down through everyone's throat yelling "YOUMUSTPASSMURRIKAISINDANGER"
